text:
Message 1093 of 4024
Should I ask him to do two trips with you sending items back then I send him back if needed?
I just assumed we move what we needed to in one go and not try arrange a time at later date. It’s been difficult to coordinate if we are seeking to have a
crew we know and trust.
Deavon will mount my tv today.
Are you paying him or me? He takes Venmo so I can do it easily and add tip. It comes out of BofA.
Sent:02/05/2024 at 08:44 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/05/2024 at 08:44 AM)
Subject:Re: Good Morning!
Message 1094 of 4024
So... great question. But the only big item would be the bikes, at this point. What else?
Awesome he is doing the TV. You might see if he can help set up the Wii like I had it.
Please pay with Venmo. I think you are including a tip from last time too.
If we get stuck today on a time sensitive decision, just call. I’m fine with that.
Woot woot! Teamwork!
Sent:02/05/2024 at 08:50 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/05/2024 at 08:57 AM)
Subject:Re: Good Morning!
Message 1095 of 4024
I assume he is at least a 34? Do you know? I think he is actually bigger than me now. I don’t wanna bother sending over old tops, but he seems to like
some of my Capri style pants Since they are all actually pretty nice and expensive. Even if they are just a size or two off, the dry cleaning lady can take
those in. But I’m too far from being able to do that. Perhaps I will make a pile of those along with the flip-flops for a swap at Basketball.
Sent:02/05/2024 at 08:57 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/05/2024 at 08:57 AM)
Subject:Max Size
Message 1096 of 4024
I think he is 32 but send over. If you can’t use at least he gets first refusal and they are expensive.
Sent:02/05/2024 at 08:58 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/05/2024 at 09:00 AM)
Subject:Re: Max Size
